titleStmt.title: Loves wound and loves cure the tune is, The VVandering spirits in the air.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere and J. VVright,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Verses in black letter, chorus lines in Roman.
Imperfect: broadside cropped with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
